name: Event
body:
### Event
Event is an Android application that reads calendar events from the device, and displays them in a neat format. Three tabs: 'Today', 'Week', and 'Month' allow you to easily and efficiently view relevant calendar events. 

### Links
You may download Event for Android on the Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ahewdev.event

### Contributors and Such
@alec-hewitt is the main contributor to this project. 
You may visit my website here! www.ahewdev.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
